member.name: T:DailyChores.Services.ChoresService
member.summary:
The DailyChores.Services.ChoreService interface. Overrides the methods from the revelant interface.
Constructor Initialises the DbContext.
CreateChore Creates new Chore from View Model.
GetAllChores Returns all Chores, present in the database.
Delete Deletes a Chore, based on its Id.

remarks.para: All back-end logic for Chore Motifying is here.
